Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Imposes term limits for members of the assembly and senate of New York
Summary: Provides that members of the assembly and senate of New York shall not serve more than six two year terms.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to imposing term limits for members of the assembly and senate of the state of New York
